extensionDescription.message: Connect to a range of Mullvad proxies without manual configuration.

notificationConnectionFailedTitle.description: Title for notification if proxy connection fails.

notificationConnectionFailedMessage.description: Message body for notification if proxy connection fails.

notificationConnectionFailedMessageNonMu.description: Message body for notification if proxy connection fails because client is not connected to Mullvad network.

notificationConnectionSucceededTitle.description: Title for notification if proxy connection succeeds.

notificationConnectionSucceededMessage.description: Message body for notification if proxy connection succeeds.

notificationConnectionDisconnectedTitle.description: Title for notification when proxy is disconnected.

notificationConnectionDisconnectedMessag.description: Message body for notification when proxy is disconnected.

popupLoading.description: Displayed in place of content whilst loading.

popupConnectionStatusConnected.description: Connection status displayed whilst connected to a proxy server.

popupConnectionStatusConnecting.description: Connection status displayed whilst connecting to a proxy.

popupConnectionStatusNotConnected.description: Connection status displayed whilst not connected to a proxy server.

popupConnectionCityPlaceholder.description: If the Mullvad API returns null for the city field.

popupSelectionCountryPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for country combo box.

popupSelectionServerPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for server combo box.
